subject: Refund
description_text:
Not nice, but expected iam no different should have read reviews before
ordering. Please with all do respect i would like a refund. I truly enjoyed
the first set I ordered off of Amazon the plus set. Thought these set the
ultimate would be a lot better,  guess i will never know. Five days have
not even a tracking number, the listing says ship's in three days, I given
5. Thank you for the first ones, I really got use out of them. But I would
love a refund for this oder, have a good day,  and thank you again.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5032 中
